title: Without prejudice
brief_description: The facts about epilepsy are contrasted with popular misconceptions. The theme is the need for unbiased attitudes towards people with epilepsy. Children who have epilepsy are shown talking about their problems. The effect that public ignorance has on people with epilepsy is clearly illustrated.
